name: Daidalos: Maze After the Fall [demo/prototype]
description:
Crawlmind was formed from students of the Game Development course at Faculty of Mathematics and Physics at Charles University. We are two programmers from MFF UK (Faculty of Mathematics and Physics), one graphic designer from UMPRUM (Academy of Arts, Architecture, and Design) and one sound designer from FFUK (Faculty of Arts). Please note this is just a prototype / demo version which was made during the course. We will appreciate any feedback for our future plans with this game.

Jakub Stacho (MFF UK) – lead programmer, game + story designer, leader
Daniel Šipoš (MFF UK) – programmer, story designer
Jakub Kozelka (UMPRUM) – lead artist, game + story designer
Kristýna Sulková (FFUK) – lead sound, VFX designer, story writer
